text:
It is missing from Apache HTTPD documentation that the acquire parameter is in milliseconds. This way it is misleading, since other time parameters are in seconds, so you should add this piece of information into the documentation.

You can check it in the online documentation:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_proxy.html#proxypass
creator: xanco@nikhok.hu

text:
Thanks for reporting.
I will read the sorce code and fix this.
